A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I created an account just to leave this review. Where to begin? First\, every great plot point set up by JJ Abrams' Force Awakens is utterly forgotten or comeletly mishandeled. Second\, every CHARACTER in the movie is destroyed by Rian Johnson's desperate attempt to subvert our expectations. My interest in the new trilogy that TFA piqued is now decimated by this grotesque\, bloated\, nonsensical\, misguided fan fiction. The smartest move for Disney would be to retcon this movie and start over. The worst Star Wars movie ever made.
